title: Which Graves Skin is the BEST?
body:
I have Been playing Graves allot and he is really OP (Riot Please Don't Nerf)  so I wanted to get a skin for him.

I really Like Mafia Graves but a load of people tell me to get Pool Pool Graves and others but I just can't chose so can you guys vote on the best Graves Skin?
TY (Also Pls Don't Troll)

replies.body:
Pool party is terrible. You feel bad when playing with it, cos the water feels as if you are doing no damage at all.
Mafia or classic.
Pool party has new particle effects
